name: Circles in a dangerous Polyrealm
description:
Oh no! Circle has lost himself in a parallel dimension filled with evil squares and hexagons! Luckily, he brough 2 things that will help him along, his new "break" ability that will allow him to dash through enemies tearing anything he touches, and a gun.

Will you be able to take down the 20 waves of enemies with only 3 hits?

FEATURES

  • Cool Post-Processing Effects! Pretty!
  • Unlockable guns! Pick from an arsenal of 3 different guns,  each with their own stats and styles of play!
  • 20 waves of pure exitement, and an extra endless wave for maximum enjoyment!
  • And a- Wait, its blank... Really? There are no more? Wow this game sucks.

CONTROLS

  • W-A-S-D: Move
  • Cursor: Aim
  • L-Click: Fire
  • R: Reload
  • R-Click: Activate Break/Break Dash

Game made in a timespan of 4 days for no apparent reason, just thought i'd give myself a challenge.

Leave your opinions about the game, bug reports and suggestions below!
